description: Billy ... Billy is another hot country boy with that southern draw. He's a bit nervous at first, but loosens right up with my jokes and falls into place for his troop review. Billy is 5'7' (ya'll know I like 'em short) and about 170 lbs. of nice, tight muscle. We tell the story of how I spotted him running in his tight ranger shorts one day by the mall and scoped him out for just the right time to hit him up with a card. Billy had no idea that the Bird was lurking in the background driving through this parking lot and that parking lot and turning down one side street after another to catch him at just the right stop to make my approach. Billy has been featured in our gallery before but this is his first video release. I'm sure you're gonna really enjoy this guy.
title: Billy
